entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 9 RC 2 #330
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-43485 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #329
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-43484 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #328
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-43483 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #327
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-38229 | .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #326
  • .NET October 2024 Updates #325

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ToString() method implementation for HttpResponseMessage class returns content.Type, instead of the content itself #108690
  • [API Proposal]: IHostApplicationBuilder chaining like IHostBuilder #108689
  • [NativeAOT] `DiagnosticMethodInfo.Create(Delegate)` does not work with closed delegates over instance methods on value types #108688
  • [WASI] When upgrading to vnext version of the WASI_SDK with clang19 there are build errors #108686
  • [wasm] System.Diagnostics.StackTrace.Tests.dll failure #108683
  • JSON source generator emitting source for types unexpectedly #108682
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-43485 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #108678
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-43484 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #108676
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-43483 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #108674
  • Intermittent fatal exception opening file dialog #108671
  • Runtime support for Swift Interop in .NET 10 #108662
    10.0.0
  • `XmlSerializer` deserialize xml with parameterless struct constructors which implement `IXmlSerializable` will throw an exception #108660
  • FileStream.SetAccessControl() is useless due to missing rights #108658
    Future
  • BitArray should support Range-Indexer (RuntimeHelpers.GetSubArray<bool>) to get a range of Bits #108657
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 3 Regressions in IndexOf #108669
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression in System.Tests.Perf_Uri #108668
  • [API Proposal]: RegionInfo.GetAllRegions() like CultureInfo.GetAllCultures() #108651
    Future
  • NativeAOT library folder structure hygiene #108649
  • Error in RuntimeInstance::GetThreadStore when calling a method from a static library. #108644
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `JsonNode.WriteTo()` with `Stream` #108643
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: SortedSet<T>.GetAlternateLookup() #108642
    10.0.0
  • Libraries test fails with "Method has zero rva" error #108641
  • Test failure: JIT/jit64/mcc/interop/mcc_i03/mcc_i03.cmd #108640
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/jit64/mcc/interop/mcc_i61/mcc_i61.cmd #108638
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add missing IsPlatform methods to `OperatingSystem` class #108632
    Future

Closed

  • Potential performance improvements for Base64 encoding and decoding using AVX-512 #31420
  • System.IO.Tests crash in CI (Linux arm64) #100441
    10.0.0
  • NativeAOT CppComilerAndLinker uses system linker (cross compiling) #105935
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression in System.Reflection.Invoke #108667
  • WasmAppHost does not serve correct CORS headers for dotnet.native.worker.mjs #108460
    10.0.0
  • BrotliEncoder.GetMaxCompressedLength returns invalid value #35142
    10.0.0
  • Last() throws an exception when applied on a concatenation of a collection with two empty collections #108477
    9.0.0
  • Enable .NET 9 developers to build more intelligent apps #97896
    9.0.0
  • Regression in net9.0 when calling a ServiceClient from a dynamically loaded Assembly #108631
  • [cdac] Implement GetPEFileBase #108450
    10.0.0
  • Geo Spatial Analysis in .NET Core 10 #108536
  • ToBase64String padding is non deterministic #108646
  • .NET 9 assert failure #108589
  • [API Proposal]: And Uri.TryCreate(params...) Equivalent API: Uri.Create(params....) #108652
  • error CS8784: Generator 'DownlevelLibraryImportGenerator' failed to initialize on osx-arm64 #107497
    10.0.0
  • [browser][icu] Find a way to test ICU sharding on Node #82593
    Future
  • Change DefaultAutomaticDecompression to DecompressionMethods.All #108163
  • What's the recommended way to serialize a customized exception in .NET 8+ #101159
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors SetSlice safety #106535
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors Inconsistent TryFlattenTo & TryBroadcastTo vs TryCopyTo #106537
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_18362/GitHub_18362/GitHub_18362.cmd #108637

PullRequests

Created

  • [WASI] Updates to work with up coming Wasi sdk #108687
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-wasi
  • [cdac] ExecutionManager contract and RangeSectionMap lookup unit tests #108685
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Delete STUBLINKER_GENERATES_UNWIND_INFO #108684
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Packaging: Port fix for GetParts from .NETFramework #108681
    area-System.IO
  • [release/9.0] [browser][host] Apply CORS also to .mjs files #108680
    needs-area-label
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #108675
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Add test case for deserializing JsonObject as JsonExtensionData #108673
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • Improve error message for TypedHttpClient missing constructor parameter #108670
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Do not ignore `MemoryMarshal.TryWrite` result in `Guid` #108661
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix GCStart message in StressLog and StressLogAnalyzer #108655
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [mono] Fix alloca builder creation #108654
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/9.0] [mono] [Swift interop] Fix InlineArray lowering with static fields #108653
    Servicing-consider, os-ios, os-tvos, area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Fixes for issue #108519 #108650
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fixes deadlock for IncrementingPollingCounter callbacks #108648
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.x
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add missing return value doc comments for Create(ROS<float> values) #108645
    area-System.Numerics, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Move hot/cold splitting phase to backend #108639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Run single EH region repair pass after layout #108634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed build error #108633
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #108679
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/9.0] Merge RC2 changes into 9.0 #108677
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved
  • ZipArchive: Improve performance of removing extra fields #108665
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [RISC-V] Fix some minor errors #107179
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [browser][debugging] Removed trailing comma that results in a warning #108583
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fixes typo of word dictionary throughout repo #108635
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, community-contribution
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108535
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Implement NibbleMap lookup and tests #108403
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Validate performance counter structs #108663
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix LINQ Last() in ConcatNIterator to also check base case (Concat2Iterator) #108664
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Linq, 9.0.0
  • [GC] Revert distribute_free_regions changes in preparation for different strategy #108417
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [browser] stop testing with nodejs #108582
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [browser][host] Apply CORS also to .mjs files #108656
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Call native BrotliEncoderMaxCompressedSize method for BrotliEncoder.GetMaxCompressedLength #108043
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • JIT: Optimize Memmove unrolling for constant src #108576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add fuzzer for Convert.To/FromBase64 APIs #108247
    area-System.Runtime
  • Fix LINQ Last() in ConcatNIterator to also check base case (Concat2Iterator) #108486
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Use the managed codec for basic constraints and remove entire X.509 extension PAL #108578
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetPEFileBase in cDAC #108602
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use a more exact base class for considerGuardedDevirtualization #108497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Make boot json file name configurable #108281
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Read messages from binlog if process output is missing build finished message #107280
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Disallow SCEV analysis of non-values #108603
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fixes for issue #108519 #108543
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser
  • [mono] Fix vector class retrieval and type checks for binary operand APIs #107388
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono, 10.0.0
  • MSFT:53847109 [.NET Core] DTS / UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups returns PrincipalOperationException: Information about the domain could not be retrieved (1212). #108032
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #108495
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update stepping through MulticastDelegate under the Debugger #108414
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [MonoVM] Improve thread state debugging and make it usable on Android #108401
    os-android, area-VM-threading-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] linux/arm64: Verify TLS resolver code #108564
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix IL2104 link #108533
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • Fix TRACE_GC build #108089
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Add loop-aware RPO, and use as LSRA's block sequence #108086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][debugging][release/9.0] Removed trailing command that results in a warning #108584
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • ILLink: Don't mark attributes from MarkEntireType #108552
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [main] guard agains empty Accept address #108616
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure to use float reserved register for TYP_SIMD12 #108629
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Ppc64le] binaryformatter and tensors tests fix #108120
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • Remove string.Trim{,Start,End}(ReadOnlySpan<char>) #108537
    area-System.Runtime, blocking-release, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] stop using mmap/munmap #108512
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Use llvm 19.1.0 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Include browser targets if RID is not wasi-wasm #108434
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • JIT: Advance cursors through stores in strength reduction #105267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix macOS arm64 Unix breakpoint #108560
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix SortedSet.InternalIndexOf 102118 #102249
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Avoid `OverflowException` in `Boolean.TryFormat` #108572
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix an issue with the last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors #108492
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Switch `SwiftSelf<T>` position requirement to last #108547
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix a set of minor DAC bugs I encountered recently #104919
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • fix stack 2x2 tensor along dimension 1 #108620
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Swift bindings] Design of Swift runtime features #2705

Closed

  • [Discussion] Generate C# bindings for SwiftUI framework #2594
  • [Discussion] Generate C# bindings for Foundation framework #2584
  • [Discussion] Generate C# bindings for CryptoKit framework #2583

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge to Sep 24 #2688

Updated

    area-CoreclrInterpreter
  • Add experimental Swift bindings for CryptoKit #2704
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installation Failure: ".NET SDK 8.0.403" on Windows 11 with Error "This app can't run on your PC" #43994
  • dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.2.24474.11-win-x64.exe -> This App can't be run on your PC -> Microsoft Windows 11 Enterprise Insider Preview #43984
  • dotnet test treating xunit skipped tests as failures #43960

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E][WIX]The installer UI could't pop out after double-clicking NET RC2 application in control panel if setting policy RemovePreviousVersion to a invalid value #43589

PullRequests

Created

  • Update aspire to pull in remaining control changes #43998
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch back to 17.8.3 for the minimum msbuild version #43995
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-rc.2.24474.1 October 2024 Updates #43993
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • pack: Save packages with lowercase versions #43988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge from rc2 to ensure we have internal flow changes #43987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #43985
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.3xx #43983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #43982
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #43981
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #43980
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SB Prebuilts Tarball #43979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement support for Aspire #43978
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • WASM and agent refactoring #43975
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Backport] Backports perf fixes to static web assets to RTM #43971
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #43959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the 6.0 and 8.0 templates #43954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #43996
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix roslyn issues with non-official version builds #43796
    untriaged, Area-SourceBuild
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #43964
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unused prebuilt baseline #43989
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #43819
    Servicing-approved
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43909
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • source-build: ensure stdout for all test projects. #43974
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #43970
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Introduce a join point for SdkLocator and VSTemplateLocator #43723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Include browser targets if RID is not wasi-wasm #43721
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk, 10.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #43673
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature
  • Backport: add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools (#39268) #43060
    untriaged, Area-Tools, DO NOT MERGE, Backport when open, 9.0.2xx
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Expand EOL list to include net7 6 months after it goes OOS per design #43440
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, Branch Lockdown
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2555810 #43920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to the November release downlevel versions #43523
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update Windows SDK projection versions #43889
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Outline of CLI UX/Option/behavior expectations for the dotnet CLI #43938
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • use SpecialFolder.UserProfile in few places #43826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Process endpoint definitions in parallel #43736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [StaticWebAssets] Fix legacy package definitions design time builds #43937
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Add Dev Device ID #43362
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43942
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • using declaration is not parsed correctly wants ";", using statement (block form) works fine. #75444
  • "Invert `#if`" refactoring #75438
  • Injected binders should be resilient to `GetBinder` calls #75437
  • IDE0300 Collection Initialization for Static Readonly Array Infinite Logic Loop #75436
  • [IntelliSense] Suggest names of remaining explicitly implementable members after dotting an implemented interface without typing the return type #75435
    Backlog
  • Compiler randomly hangs (deadlock?) only on macOS/Linux #75431
  • Nullability mismatch in non-`ref` foreach cannot be suppressed #75430
    17.13
  • Quick info shows incorrect `Dispose` method when hovering over `using` keyword #75429
    Backlog

Closed

  • Create Required Property in C# with propr #75128
  • Inconsistent display string for names which require escaping #75434
    Backlog
  • CSC : error CS8034: Unable to load Analyzer assembly #74887
    17.12
  • Precompile compile-time declared Lambda Expression. #74178
  • Cannot rename tuple `using` alias #75433
  • IDE0037 is not working #75428
  • New type of expression (compile time constant) to use in attributes #75367

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75442
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75440
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Do not use overload resolution for expression tree conversion #75427
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2555781 #75443
    auto-merge
  • Added "propr" snippet for required properties #75339
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75441
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75421
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75419
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix some more unnecessary NFW reporting #75403
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Reduce allocations in TypeSymbolExtensions.IsAtLeastAsVisibleAs #75401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations from creating MissingTokenWithTrivia objects #75404
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add a WorkspaceKind property to ProjectContext. #75384
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add span conversions to the compiler test plan #75415
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Escape the line #75425
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add warning when property has a backing field but a manually implemented accessor does not use it #75325
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fixing the OOM in scripting #75372
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, Needs API Review, VSCode, Backlog
  • Revert "Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding (#64928)" #75406
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EE: Handle notification when metadata has been invalidated #75423
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Report LSP loading telemetry #75402
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix circularity issue with binding const local #75371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow more of Razor to use Roslyn Lsp types #74597
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle span conversions in `is` operator #75413
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Have find references navigate to a position instead of a span #75418
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Support unbound generic types in 'nameof' operator. #75368
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Support modifiers with simple lambda parameters. #75400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix updating solution fallback options #75417
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Report diagnostics from `TryFindDisposePatternMethod` when binding `foreach` loop #75422
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Verify that semantic snippets obey IDE preferences #75073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix assignment analysis of ref fields #75340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix Color Color const field initialization accessing the Color type #68283
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, New Language Feature - File-Local Types, Needs API Review, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #58302
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-38229 | .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #58297
  • Allow running two IServer implementations side by side #58288

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E][WIX]After configuring the policy key for .NET 9 and set it to nextSession then sign out of the machine and sign back, the net9RC1 Hosting Bundle cannot be removed. #58291
    9.0.0
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudAddProduct #58259
  • Perf regression: caching #58254

  • Change usage of "Country" to "CountryRegion" #58279

  • Remove ProviderKey from Hosting Bundle #58292

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

Closed

    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • Disable TitleViewSetOnShellWorksAfterNavigation on Device Tests #25125
    area-testing

Updated

  • [iOS] Changed UIImageRenderingMode for buttons #25107

  • Move TitleViewSetOnShellWorksAfterNavigation to Appium #25094
    area-testing
  • Fix Regression with iOS button resizing with text or image change #25122
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button, .NET 8 SR9.2
  • Fixed Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #25006

    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label

    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • Fixed NavigationPage TitleBar visibility issue when set to the parent page #25000

  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004

  • Debug slow controls device tests #25096

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Data.SqlClient is out of date #34856
  • Discriminator on derived type is being incorrectly updated with integer value of enum (EF Core CosmosDB provider) #34852
  • Too many columns selected for collection subquery #34851
    Backlog
  • DefaultTypeMappings do not seem to be applied in queries. #34850
  • Union in collection subquery cannot be translated #34849
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `efcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #34848

Closed

  • Don't require connection string during migration remove #34788
  • After upgrading from version 3.1.4 to 8.0.8, I can no longer lock using queries that use FromSqlInterpolated. #34835
  • Help to detect that a propery is stored in a JSON string #34568
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `efcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #34827
  • config drop existing #34683
  • Combination of IgnoreQueryFilters with Max throws exception. #34682
  • Support ExecuteDelete and ExecuetUpdate for sqllite #34741
  • Query translate bug using compat level 120 #34703
  • Performance decrease (10 second delay) in database migration 8.0.0 vs 8.0.3 #33399
    8.0.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #34854
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #34853

Merged

  • Merge internal flow changes from rc2 #34855
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0' into release/9.0 #34828
  • thoughts on caching argumentsPropagateNullability arrays? #34422

Updated

  • Add SqlServer DATEPART support for Microsecond and Nanosecond properties. #34135
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34770
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.2.5 to 9.0.0 #34842
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • fix-kusto-scaffold #34832
